title: Several 1909 Obaks for sale.....prices lowered on remaining cards
author: shammus

posts.post_title: Several 1909 Obaks for sale.....prices lowered on remaining cards
posts.post_content:
Got a few 1909 Obaks up for sale.  A couple of these are amongs the tougher ones to find in the set.  All are nice looking though and nice looking cards are very difficult to come across in this set.  All prices include shipping and scans are available upon request.  Thanks in advance!

-Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]

Ehman (Sacramento) SGC 30 - slight touches to corners/no creasing (TOUGH! and previously uncatalogued) --- $165 
Browning (SF) SGC 30 - mild staining on back --- $165
R.Williams (SF.) SGC 30 - crease in upper left --- $165 
Don Carlos Ragan (Oakland) SGC 40 - slight touches to corners/no creasing (TOUGH!) --- SOLD

Ragan has sold however prices on the other three have been reduced.

Thanks in advance,
Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]
